channel.title: [Devolution V7] How do I make a working bow?
channel.description: I want to make Seercull a working bow, with arrows, range (farness apart and shooting), and it trains range exp. Please post how! I already searched and couldn't find it! Please post! :( :mad: :(

item.title: [Devolution V7] How do I make a working bow?
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

i did, everything i found with the magic shortbow ids, i added it in. It still needs to use range and still shoot from far away, and gain range experience. It already shoots like a normal bow, and trains attack. It says chop, slash, crush, and slash.

Read full topic
item.source: [Devolution V7] How do I make a working bow?

item.title: [Devolution V7] How do I make a working bow?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

There’s many things you have to consider.
Add it with all of your other range methods.

Read full topic
